name: Unmuted
description:
Control the music to interfere with surrounding world. It's not you who control it, but the music itself. Turning sound layers on and off, deciding if bit is there or not, manipulate the level and pass it.

Best played with gamepad.

Keyboard controls: arrows, space bar, z, x, c

Developed during Nordic Game Jam 2017 by: Krzysztof Siewiorek, João Respeito, Piotr Gryko, Dawid W. Mika, Łukasz Siewiorek
